readability_reflection: I found reading string concatenation to be more readable because brackets could be misleading sometimes. With string concatenation I was able to read it easily.
comprehension_debugging: I noticed reading string concatenation was quicker and more efficient.
preference_rationale: I would choose string concatenation because the readability is easier and much more easier to understand.
learning_curve: Seeing adding like "Hello" + "World" = HelloWorld makes a lot more sense because of the addition sign.
suggestions_improvement: I suggest emphasizing more on variables and what they mean.
